Intermediate Level English Resources

This page is a portal to all materials that are appropriate for intermediate learners of English. It is organized as follows:

  • Reading
  • Listening
  • Writing
  • Speaking
  • Grammar
  • Vocabulary

If you are interested in more professional uses of English, please see Business English.

If you are taking an exam, please see my pages on exam English for B1 exams (PET, BEC) and B2 exams (FCE, BEC Vantage, IELTS Band 5.5 - 6.5)
